prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant red spots and yellow underbelly.
Imagine a tiny creature that can blend in with flowers in a forest.
Generate a small, friendly Pokemon that loves to flutter around grassy fields.
Show me a Pokemon that can lift its wings to reveal colorful patterns.
Design a playful insect-like Pokemon that enjoys sunny days in the park.
Make a Pokemon that has big expressive eyes and a cheerful demeanor.
Give me a cute Pokemon that can be found in urban gardens and parks.
